extension_name.message: Saladict, a Feature-Rich Inline Translator. Chrome / Firefox A Leudachadh.

extension_description.message: Saladict a tha proifeiseanta am facal-eadar-theangachadh an leudachan, a chaidh a chruthachadh airson tar-leughaidh. 'S e mòr àireamh cinnteach againn faclairean cover English, French, Japanese, agus' s e, agus an taic a tha am facal a ' giollachd, duilleag-lìn air an eadar-theangachadh, facal leabhraichean, agus a PDF brabhsadh.

command_open_quick_search.message: Fosgail no soillsich standalone dict panel

command_search_clipboard.message: Lorg an stòr-bhòrd content in Standalone Panel
